column4: jeez!i cant take this! :) why is ubuntu running so slowly? anyone?
what should i look for in that output?
it should show you anything currently running. Kill anything you think is slowing your system.
well i'm building a kernel. but even when i'm not doing that everything is unbearably slow.and i've got P4 smp processor, so i dont know whats wrong
what's the load on your box?
thats with a kernel build running
fair enough. Perhaps ask again when you're not?
maybe something is running with nice at minus numbers?
they're last. i'd get a different card if i could (laptop)
I got my laptop ATI to work with that
